name: Meta Apes
storyline:
Nuclear warfare swept away almost the entire human race. The survivors had no choice but to flee the earth in spaceships after the catastrophe. Time passed slower in the post-apocalyptic world, and no one would’ve imagined something to flourish in the wasteland.

And that’s when the Apes took over!

Now it’s your turn to conquer the Planet of Apes and take the Apes forward in their mission: Space Hegemony. Help them explore the ruins of humans, search for resources, fight the enemies, and build cities and communities.
summary: Meta Apes is a free-to-play, play-and-earn MMO strategy game. It is set in a post-apocalyptic world, in which humanity has ended and a new era ruled by Apes has begun. Next on the agenda is space domination. Each pri-mate (yes, you) will have to work closely with their Gang to become the strongest Clan and win the ultimate race to space.
